DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study assess clinical laboratory safety determine pharmacokinetic profile FBF001 .
DOC.criteria: subject 2140 year old body mass index range 18 30 Kg/m2 Any history presence clinically relevant cardiovascular , pulmonary , gastrointestinal , hepatic , renal , metabolic , haematological , neurological , osteomuscular , articular , psychiatric , systemic , ocular , infectious disease , sign acute illness Any vaccination within three month inclusion Any vaccination H5N1 virus Planned receipt vaccine study Any infectious disease within month inclusion Any history animal protein allergy , animal allergy and/or drug , food pollen allergy Who receive blood plasma derivative ( human animal ) three month precede initiation study Any medication within 14 day inclusion within 5 time elimination halflife pharmacodynamic halflife drug
